about.text: I'm passionate about front-end technologies, I have knowledge in the area of ​​web design, web development and agile methodologies. I have had the opportunity to work in monolithic applications applying technologies such as React and Angular under a REST API architecture, always oriented to good practices and clean and maintainable code.

desc: Currently I work in the frontend development of several internal applications of the company using as technological stack: Javascript, Typescript, React, Angular; on an architecture of REST API services created with NodeJs and MS SQL.

I worked in the maintenance of a system for home purchase of Fiduciaria de Bogota, where I had the opportunity to work with Docusign API, credit history validations, Sarlaft validations and development technologies such as React, VueJS and NodeJs, all this under a cloud architecture with GCP and REST API.
I developed a request management system for Frontera Energy, in this system Javascript-based technologies were used, such as App Script and the use of APIs to manipulate GSuite services.
I worked on construction a warranty tracking system for travel products, using a multi-tenant architecture with PostgreSQL, Java-based REST API and Angular for frontend development.
I worked on the maintenance and bug resolution of a VOIP call management and ticket tracking platform with technologies as Java and React.
I worked in the construction of a monetary credit management system using REST API architecture with PHP and consuming each service from a front-end developed in Angular.
I developed a mobile application to consult monetary credits with the Nativescript framework, implementing the communication to a REST API.
I designed static web pages using HTML5, CSS and Bootstrap 4.

education.degree: Technology in Analysis and Development of Information Systems

interests.text-one: I dedicate my time to research on new technologies that appear continuously, especially in the front-end area and can contribute to my professional and personal growth.
interests.text-two: I also enjoy reading mystery and fantasy novels, as well as creating DIY projects for carpentry and construction.
